mapper.select: SELECT memberNo, email, pwd, name, nickName, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth , gender, TO_CHAR(joindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') joindate , NVL(TO_CHAR(recentdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') recentdate, NVL(wrongcnt, 0) wrongcnt , NVL(TO_CHAR(modifydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') modifydate, enabled, membership FROM member WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET birth = #{birth} , name = #{name}, nickName = #{nickName}, modifydate = SYSDATE WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT memberNo, email, pwd, name, nickName, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth , gender, TO_CHAR(joindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') joindate , NVL(TO_CHAR(recentdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') recentdate, NVL(wrongcnt, 0) wrongcnt , NVL(TO_CHAR(modifydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') modifydate, enabled, membership FROM member WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}

SELECT c.qnaNo, qnaacontent, TO_CHAR(qnaaregdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') qnaaregdate, m.name FROM qnareply c JOIN member m ON c.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE memberShip = 99 ORDER BY c.qnaNo DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) dataCount FROM ${table} c JOIN member m ON c.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE memberShip = 99

SELECT c.faqNo, faqsubject, TO_CHAR(faqregdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') faqregdate, m.name FROM faq c JOIN member m ON c.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE memberShip = 99 ORDER BY c.faqNo DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT memberNo, email, pwd, name, nickName, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth , gender, TO_CHAR(joindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') joindate , NVL(TO_CHAR(recentdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') recentdate, NVL(wrongcnt, 0) wrongcnt , NVL(TO_CHAR(modifydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '2999-01-01') modifydate, enabled, membership FROM member WHERE membership = 99 AND memberNo != #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET membership = 1 WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
UPDATE authority SET authority = 'ROLE_USER' WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
